fieldUpdates.description: Connector: The workflow rule is needed for the connector. It copies the last modified date in a custom field. It is a workaround as only the custom field can be indexed, the standard last modified field cannot be indexed.

rules.description: Writes the last modified date in a separate custom field. This is necessary for the upserted job as the normal last modified field cannot be indexed and this custom field can now be indexed.
